metadata.title: CVE-2024-35800 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:efi: fix panic in kdump kernelCheck if get_next_variable() is actually valid pointer beforecalling it. In kdump kernel this method is set to NULL that causespanic during the kexec-ed kernel boot.Tested with QEMU and OVMF firmware.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
